arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَحۡمِلُ كُلُّ أُنثَىٰ وَمَا تَغِيضُ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامُ وَمَا تَزۡدَادُۚ وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٍ عِندَهُۥ بِمِقۡدَارٍ
translation: (8) Allāh knows what every female carries[629] and what the wombs lose [prematurely] or exceed.[630] And everything with Him is by due measure.
footnotes:
[629]- With absolute knowledge inclusive of every aspect of the fetus' existence.
[630]- Beyond their normal period of pregnancy and/or the number of fetuses therein.
